name: server-template
description: Server template on Node JS v18.7.0 with support Express, PostgreSQL v12 and architectural style REST API.

scripts.start: npm run devup && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run devup && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon ./api/api.js
scripts.prod: npm run produp && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./api/api.js
scripts.test: npm run testup && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing nodemon ./api/api.js

author: Konstantinov Egor
